v-model.description: The currently selected item corresponds to the selected value
v-model.description_zh: 当前选中项对应选中的 value

options.description: List data, corresponding to the data structure [{text: 'title', value: '0', tip: 'prompt text'}]
options.description_zh: 列表数据，对应数据结构 [{text: '标题', value: '0', tip: '提示文字'}]

icon-name.description: Name of the selected icon (optional name in the wd-icon component)
icon-name.description_zh: 选中的图标名称(可选名称在 wd-icon 组件中)

before-toggle.description: The drop-down menu is triggered before opening or closing, and continues to perform the opening or closing operation when reslove(true).
before-toggle.description_zh: 下拉菜单打开或者关闭前触发，reslove(true)时继续执行打开或关闭操作

value-key.description: option object, the key corresponding to the value
value-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，value 对应的 key

label-key.description: In the options object, the key corresponding to the displayed text
label-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，展示的文本对应的 key

tip-key.description: Option object, the key corresponding to the option description
tip-key.description_zh: 选项对象中，选项说明对应的 key
